statements: SELECT * FROM ad_performance
SELECT * FROM ad_performance WHERE ad_id = 1
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, impressions FROM ad_performance ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT ad_id, clicks, roi FROM ad_performance WHERE campaign_id = 3
SELECT SUM(impressions), AVG(conversion_rate) FROM ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, impressions, clicks, spend, conversion_rate, roi FROM ad_performance WHERE ad_id = 12345 ORDER BY impressions DESC, clicks ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) as total_clicks, SUM(spend) as total_spend FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_spend > 1000 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, conversion_rate, roi FROM ad_performance WHERE campaign_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY roi DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_id, spend, conversion_rate FROM ad_performance WHERE impressions > 1000 AND clicks > 100 ORDER BY spend DESC, conversion_rate ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(spend) as avg_spend, AVG(conversion_rate) as avg_conversion_rate FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING AVG(spend) > 500 ORDER BY avg_conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_data;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, impressions FROM ad_performance_data;
SELECT campaign_id, cost_per_click FROM ad_performance_data ORDER BY cost_per_click DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_data WHERE campaign_status = 'active';
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date, total_budget FROM campaign_data ORDER BY total_budget ASC;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, impressions FROM ad_performance_data;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE campaign_status = 'active';
SELECT ad_id, cost_per_click FROM ad_performance_data WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions < 500;
SELECT campaign_id, total_budget, targeted_audience, campaign_status FROM campaign_data WHERE total_budget > 5000 ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, clicks, impressions, conversion_ratio FROM ad_performance_data JOIN campaign_data ON ad_performance_data.campaign_id = campaign_data.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM Ads;
SELECT ad_id, ad_type, clicks FROM Ads WHERE views > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM Users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, cost FROM Ads WHERE cost > 500 AND clicks > 50;
SELECT * FROM Ads WHERE ad_type = 'Banner' ORDER BY clicks DESC, views ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(views) AS total_views, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM Ads GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT Users.name, Users.email, Campaigns.total_budget FROM Users INNER JOIN Campaigns ON Users.user_id = Campaigns.campaign_id WHERE Campaigns.status = 'Active';
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM Ads GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING AVG(cost) > 50;
SELECT Users.country, COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns FROM Users INNER JOIN Campaigns ON Users.user_id = Campaigns.campaign_id GROUP BY Users.country ORDER BY total_campaigns DESC;
SELECT ad_id, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign;
SELECT client_name, industry FROM client;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ad;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, conversions FROM ad_performance;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance WHERE impressions > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT client_id, client_name, industry FROM client WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type FROM ad WHERE client_id = 123 ORDER BY ad_name DESC;

SELECT ad_performance.ad_id, ad.ad_name, ad.performance.clicks FROM ad_performance INNER JOIN ad ON ad_performance.ad_id = ad.ad_id WHERE ad_performance.clicks > 50 ORDER BY ad_performance.conversions DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY ad_id HAVING total_clicks > 10;
SELECT ad_id, AVG(cost_amount) AS avg_cost FROM ad_costs GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY avg_cost DESC;
SELECT ac.click_date, ac.user_id, ac.ad_id, ac.id, ac.cost_amount FROM ad_clicks ac JOIN ad_costs cost ON ac.ad_id = cost.ad_id WHERE cost_amount >= 100;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC, start_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS impressions_count FROM ad_impressions GROUP BY ad_id HAVING impressions_count > 50 ORDER BY impressions_count DESC
SELECT c.ad_id, COUNT(*) AS click_count, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM ad_clicks AS c JOIN ad_costs AS cc ON c.ad_id = cc.ad_id GROUP BY c.ad_id ORDER BY total_cost DESC

SELECT ac.ad_id, ac.conversion_date, COUNT(*) AS conversion_count FROM ad_conversions AS ac JOIN ad_clicks AS aclick ON ac.ad_id = aclick.ad_id GROUP BY ac.ad_id, ac.conversion_date ORDER BY conversion_count DESC
